## moirai package

Moirai is a library for stringifying JS Objects.

## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [NumberFormat](./moirai.numberformat.md) | Types for number formatting. |
|  [Verbosity](./moirai.verbosity.md) | Verbosity levels of stringified objects. |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [\_stringify(verbosity)](./moirai._stringify.md) | Tagger to stringify all placeholders in the template string. |
|  [stringify(target, verbosity, format)](./moirai.stringify.md) | Stringifies the given number. |
|  [stringify(target, verbosity)](./moirai.stringify_1.md) | Stringifies the given object. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [customStringify](./moirai.customstringify.md) | Symbol of custom function to stringify an object. |

## Remarks

This is used mainly for printing out objects for debugging purposes.
